name: Cute Cube Jump!
description:
TAP to JUMP over the enemies!
SWIPE to the side to evade the oncoming enemies!

Futuraba Cube is an endless runner inspired by the 80's. You are a cube that collects smaller cubes. You have to evade the attacking enemies and the spikes on the ground. Press once to jump. Swipe left and right to evade. Try to reach as far as possible and collect as many cubes as possible! Spend your collected cubes in the shop on new cubes.

Get the Android version and you can:

★ Unlock new Cubes!
★ Get more Cubes from the Shop
★ Google Play Achievements 
★ Google Play Leaderboards for showing off against your friends!

If you want it on the App Store for your Apple device, you will have to wait until I can get a developer license.
